mapper.select: SELECT MEM_PW FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{value}

SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_ZIPCODE, MEM_ADDRESS1, MEM_ADDRESS2, MEM_CDATE, MEM_GENDER, MEM_BIRTHDAY, MEM_TPRICE, MEM_EMAIL, a.G_GRADE, MEM_POINT, MEM_NICKNAME, G_DISCOUNT, COUPON_COUNT FROM TB_MEMBER a, (SELECT COUNT(CP_NO) as COUPON_COUNT FROM TB_COUPONZIP) b, TB_MEMBERSHIP c WHERE a.G_GRADE = c.G_GRADE(+) AND a.MEM_ID = #{value}
